name: WOSHIOP
overview:
WO-SH-I-O-P: WO: World SH: Shopping I: In O: One P: Place This is the largest business owners network on the Globe Who should use woshiop.com?

  1. Everybody with a business, a service or a product
  2. Everyone who wants to become an entrepreneur
  3. Everyone with a skill who wants become known all around the world 4.Everyone who wants a business partner
  4. Everyone who has something to sell

Company Background

Woshiop started out in a college living room of co-founder Richard in 2012. The site officially launched on May 10, 2012. At the end of the first month in operation, woshiop had a total of 4,500 members in the network. The company is privately held and has a diversified business model with revenues coming from sourcing solutions, marketing solutions and premium subscriptions.

Woshiop Facts

Woshiop operates and will always oprate the world’s largest business owners network on the Internet in over 200 countries and territories. Woshiop’s mission is to connect the world’s business owners to make them more productive and successful. Headquartered in Oneonta, NY, Woshiop also has U.S. offices in Spartanburg, South Carolina,Los Angeles, and New York. International Woshiop offices are located in Paris, Brussels, and The Company’s management team is comprised of seasoned executives from big companies. Woshiop is currently available in ten languages: English, Czech, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, and Spanish.

For more information, please visit our Company Information page. Members of the media may direct inquiries to info@woshiop.com
